description: This easy chicken salad is packed with colour and crunch. It's perfect for a quick, fresh midweek lunch.
name: 20-Minute Chicken Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 420 g can no added salt corn kernels

recipeInstructions.text: Place rainbow coleslaw and baby spinach and rocket leaves on a platter. Add corn kernels and cooked chicken pieces. Top with crushed peanuts, chopped coriander and a squeeze of lemon. Toss and serve warm.
